TopicTitle: A Request from one artist to another ...

Articles.Content:
Developing my personal flag, which is a play on these little green men and Jeb's uncanny ability to pull a successful mission out of his ... hat.

I could do a Kerbal head on ol' master Yoda, but I'm being lazy (too many side projects at the moment).

Any artists out there willing to sub a Kerbal head of the wise master of the Force in this example flag? Contact me via PM and I'll send you the PSD work file.

If not, no big deal ... I"ll get to it eventually!
*laughs hysterically* I'm not the only Star Wars fan here!
